subject: Climate & Environment
title: What Makes Water Unsafe
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on What Makes Water Unsafe.

hook.text: Water that looks perfectly clear can contain bacteria, chemicals, and parasites.

buildup.text: Pathogens from human and animal waste are the most common contaminants globally.

discovery.text: Pesticides, heavy metals, and industrial chemicals seep into water from farms and factories.

twist.text: Microplastics have been found in tap water, bottled water, and even Antarctic snow.

climax.text: 2 billion people still drink water contaminated with feces. Safe water saves more lives than medicine.

punchline.text: Clean-looking water and clean water are not the same thing.

quiz.question: What is the most common water contaminant globally?
options: Pathogens from human and animal waste
